data.comment: Today's referee, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin, has blown to start the match.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 3, Fedor Smolov (Lokomotiv Moscow) strikes at Central Stadium but his header is cleared.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 5, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Andrey Egorychev of Ural Yekaterinburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 8, Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Aleksey Miranchuk breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 11, Ural Yekaterinburg are coming forward and Eric Bicfalvi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 13, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 16, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Grzegorz Krychowiak gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In Ekaterinburg Lokomotiv Moscow attack through Fedor Smolov. The finish is off target, however.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andrey Egorychev for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
Fedor Smolov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Fedor Smolov is back on his feet again.
In the minute 26, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Dmitri Barinov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 29, Vyacheslav Podberezkin (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 30, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Panyukov has been booked in Ekaterinburg.
Vyacheslav Podberezkin is back on the pitch.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ekaterinburg to check on Vyacheslav Podberezkin, who is grimacing with pain.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 34, The match at Central Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Eric Bicfalvi, who is down injured.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Eric Bicfalvi for Ural Yekaterinburg is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 42, Fedor Smolov for Lokomotiv Moscow drives towards goal at Central Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In Ekaterinburg, Grzegorz Krychowiak of Lokomotiv Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Ekaterinburg.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Central Stadium.
The second-half has started.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Grzegorz Krychowiak's finish is wide of the goal.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Eric Bicfalvi for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and receives a first yellow card.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow drives forward and Aleksey Miranchuk gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 52, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ural Yekaterinburg's Denys Kulakov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 55, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 58, In Ekaterinburg Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward through Aleksey Miranchuk. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at Central Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Igor Kalinin is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 65, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Igor Kalinin for Ural Yekaterinburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Dmitri Efremov is replacing Vyacheslav Podberezkin for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 65, Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Anton Miranchuk replacing Dmitry Rybchinskiy.
Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Denys Kulakov is whistled for offside at Central Stadium.
In the minute 68, Aleksey Miranchuk of Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 70, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Rifat Zhemaletdinov misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 74, Andrey Egorychev scores to make it 1-0 at Central Stadium.
Great play from Dmitri Efremov to set up the goal.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
In the minute 75, Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg drive forward but Andrey Panyukov is judged offside.
The away team have replaced Rifat Zhemaletdinov with Eder. This is the second substitution made today by Marko Nikolic.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 77, Yuriy Matveev is making the team's second substitution at Central Stadium with Yuri Bavin replacing Danijel Miskic.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Central Stadium.
David Karaev is replacing Andrey Panyukov for the home team.
In the minute 81, Maciej Rybus (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 82, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Aleksey Miranchuk gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fedor Smolov grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Central Stadium.
Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 87, Lokomotiv Moscow make their third substitution with Vitali Lisakovich replacing Dmitri Barinov.
Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Ekaterinburg.
David Karaev for Ural Yekaterinburg is whistled offside.
In Ekaterinburg Lokomotiv Moscow attack through Maciej Rybus. The finish is off target, however.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In Ekaterinburg, Fedor Smolov (Lokomotiv Moscow) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match has come to a close in Ekaterinburg. The final score is 1-1.
Ilya Pomazun (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
